solution_line_template: After Jeff swam on Saturday, there remained {total_laps_required} - {laps_swam_saturday} = <<{total_laps_required}-{laps_swam_saturday}={remaining_after_saturday}>>{remaining_after_saturday} laps

After Sunday morning’s {laps_swam_sunday_morning} laps there remained {remaining_after_saturday} - {laps_swam_sunday_morning} = <<{remaining_after_saturday}-{laps_swam_sunday_morning}={remaining_after_sunday_morning}>>{remaining_after_sunday_morning} laps
